title: EP 88: 2020 In Our Rearview
itunes:title: EP 88: 2020 In Our Rearview
description:
2020 was a year none of us will ever forget. It will be forever marked as the year a microscopic virus changed the way we move. We briefly discuss the continuing senseless violence and other sh*t that's on our mind.

See you in 2021 God Bless

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
